channel.title: Jagex's cunning little plan unraveled
channel.description:
Some of you have noticed the new Shop Improvement(haha, yeah, whatever) on the 2nd of Oct, but I only noticed it today, but I noticed something else, a cunning plan by Jagex.
So, what is wrong with the new improvement? Selling has got faster, buying EXTREMELY faster(50k a time), what's there not lot to like? Well, apart from the gem shop in ardougne, or the silver guy not selling bulk gems/silver ore/bars, there isn't much to hate about it. Elemental runes have now gone down in price from 24(player price) to 17, but what about nature runes? They stock at 372 each now, up almost 72gp per rune from player prices. Also, they've gone up from their previous max price of 350. This, my friends, is the plan, try and fuck up the market. Yew logs have gone up from 250 to 350, improvement for the yew cutters eh?
So, now, if you buy 1 yew log from players, and 1 nature rune from a shop, that leaves you 46gp. We still have to buy natures from players, yew logs have gone up RIDICULOUSLY, and the demise of runecrafting is upon us. If yews go down to 300gp, you won't need to buy natures from players. That would be an ideal situation for alchers, flax and yews are always easy to buy(I bought 16k flax and 16k yews within 30 mins), however natures aren't. Like I said, if yews go down to 300gp, there's no need to buy from players(unless you want profit), and you only loose 4gp an alch(yes, 400k per 100k alchs, easily enough to get you to 94 mage from 80), as a result, mage levels soar up, runecrafting(or possibly fletching) gets ruined, rangers soar up. GG melee, you've been broken.

item.title: Jagex's cunning little plan unraveled
item.dc:creator: @Enjoy_me_now Enjoy me now
item.description:
@Enjoy_me_now wrote:

[quote=“philiplg, post:9, topic:151331”][quote author=Enjoy me now link=topic=206986.msg1820600#msg1820600 date=1192316211]
well hes right, but they did that because noobs and I MEAN THEM!!(DAM YOU JAGEX FOR BEING SYMPATHATIC TO NUBS AND NOT HIGLEVELS!!!) if you go to rants you will see many nubs posting like "whip is too much, oh black dagger is too much, i cant afford bronze! and other weird things. this is to make sure that prices go down, for the nubs who think “OMFG I HAVE 10K!! IM RICH!”
[/quote]
spoil my dreams when i was the noob i got scammed out of everything the first time i played then someone helped me to earnest the chicken i got 400gp wow i thought i was god that day then people used to say selling blah blah for 4k i as like holy hell thats alot… but still i havent managed to reach 1m i get close then blow it on items but ya… jagex needs noobs to stay in hope they will P2P therefor make it easy to WC noobs so they thing its a good game but then jagex also helps autoers by making the yew prices increase… just go behind varrok castle world 30 at a busy time of day and wach the Autoers its like a wave of green and beigh/brown (noobs without armor on).[/quote]

lol jagex helps them uot too much noobs are too pampered and are just obnoxous little 5 year olds

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex's cunning little plan unraveled
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

i dont see why they drop prices on things i mean i have seen several people that were pures walking around with 2b and a party hat… if your good at staking you will have 2b and phat set in a week. You could be lvl 30 and make 2b of staking as long as you know what you are doing. If you dont then thats your problem. I really dont see why people are poor in this game its so easy to get rich as long as you have luck + skill

ninja nub:

I have nothign to complain, now I can afford natures. But now I have to sell all my stuff for over half of it’s original price. For instance rune boots and whips.

You can afford nats now that they’re expensive? Wtf?

item.title: Jagex's cunning little plan unraveled
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I know this topic is a week or two old but still…

Jagex have done two bad things for autoers:

  1. Runes wont take ages to buy so no one will buy the runes from the asian people who sit there all day buying runes.
  2. Nats prices have been increased, inevitablly i believe this will drive down the price of yews, and that will slow autoers cutting yews.

nomsain
